msg.msgText: imaserver group list "Item1=value" ... SYNTAX: imaserver group list help imaserver group list "Item1=value" ... EXAMPLE: imaserver group list "GroupID=msgGroup1" "Type=Messaging" imaserver group list "Type=WebUI" Configuration items are: GroupID The group ID. If not specified, all groups will be listed. Type The group type. Only [WebUI] or [Messaging] are allowed. Count The number of group entries to be displayed on the screen at a time. NOTES: 1. "Type" is a required item. 2. All "Key=value" pair must be enclosed within double quotation marks.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
